thread.title: Please inform me what the yahoo message "Your criteria doesn't match any questions" implies ?
thread.title_full: Please inform me what the yahoo message "Your criteria doesn't match any questions" implies ? | Yahoo Answers

author: answers.yahoo.com
text:
A major failure of the Search Engine.
I click on HOME page, and get the same response after a minute of "searching"
Just going to a page without any "criteria" other than the page itself.
Followed by numerous tapping of the [F5] reload key, or closing and trying again.
Too many problems.
Cannot Report Violations because of
[*] We are experiencing some problems, please try again.
[*] This question does not exist or is under review.
[*] Oops, something went wrong
I spend more time reloading and reloading and reloading than I do being able to actually answer a decent question.
BTW. Yahoo! does not have any support Telephone Numbers, and appears to allow Imposters & Frauds to post them for profit.
Yahoo! support is Free.
